reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Dynamic Queue' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Verify the 'Dynamic Queue' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Click the 'Home' menu link.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Click the 'Add dynamic queue type' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add dynamic queue type dialog'.
STEP 4
Enter 'c491aa9d965f4cc' in the 'Name' text box.
Select 'Content' from the 'Entity type' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Verify the text 'c491aa9d965f4cc' is present on the page.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 5
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Dynamic Queues' menu link.
Click the 'Add c491aa9d965f4cc' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add c491aa9d965f4cc dynamic queue dialog'.
STEP 6
Enter 'a7f280549af048e' in the 'Title' text box.
Click the 'Newest' radio button under 'Sort by'.
Click the 'Save Dynamic Queue' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queues dialog'.
Verify the text 'a7f280549af048e' is present on the page.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 7
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Enter '459c466cb39048b' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Assert that img source of the Cover Photo contains 'HanSolo'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Character Profile 459c466cb39048b has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '653f70f58d34409' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 653f70f58d34409 has been created.' is present.
STEP 8
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queues' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queues dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com/dynamic-queue/66'.
Verify the text '653f70f58d34409' is present on the page.
Verify the text '459c466cb39048b' is present on the page.
STEP 9
STEP 10
STEP 11
STEP 12
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Click the 'edit' link for Dynamic Queue Type 'c491aa9d965f4cc.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit c491aa9d965f4cc dialog'.
STEP 13
Check the 'Movie' check box.
Check the 'Person' check box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 14
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Dynamic Queues' menu link.
Click the 'Add c491aa9d965f4cc' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add c491aa9d965f4cc dynamic queue dialog'.
Verify Target bundle content count equals '2'.
Verify content type 'Movie' is present in list of Target bundles.
Verify content type 'Person' is present in list of Target bundles.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 15
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Click the 'manage display' link for Dynamic Queue Type 'c491aa9d965f4cc.
Switch to the active frame titled 'c491aa9d965f4cc dialog'.
Verify the text 'Full content' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Teaser' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'RSS' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Revision comparison' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Tokens' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'User Ref Preview' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Administrative Refrence Preview' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Promoted Content' is present on the page.
STEP 16
Select 'Full content' from the 'Entity List' Formate drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Verify the text '459c466cb39048b' is present on the page.
Verify the text '653f70f58d34409' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Character: First Name' is present on the page.
STEP 17
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Click the 'manage display' link for Dynamic Queue Type 'c491aa9d965f4cc.
Switch to the active frame titled 'c491aa9d965f4cc dialog'.
Select 'Teaser' from the 'Entity List' Formate drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Verify the text '459c466cb39048b' is present on the page.
Verify the text '653f70f58d34409' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Character: First Name' is NOT present on the page.
STEP 18
STEP 19
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Display suite' menu link.
Mouse over the 'View modes' menu link.
Click the 'Add a view mode' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'View modes dialog'.
Enter '7e30037bb2534e2' in the 'Label' text box.
Click the 'Node' Entity check box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'The view mode 7e30037bb2534e2 has been saved' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 20
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Click the 'manage display' link for Dynamic Queue Type 'c491aa9d965f4cc.
Switch to the active frame titled 'c491aa9d965f4cc dialog'.
STEP 21
Select '7e30037bb2534e2' from the 'Entity List' Formate drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Verify the text '459c466cb39048b' is present on the page.
Verify the text '653f70f58d34409' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Character: First Name' is present on the page.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Are you sure you want to delete the Dynamic Queue type c491aa9d965f4cc? dialog'.
Click the 'Confirm' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
